titleStmt.title: A funeral sermon preach'd at the internment of Mr. Samuel Stephens for some time employ'd in the work of the ministry, in this city : who departed life the fifth of January, 1693/4 in the twenty eighth year of his age / by Edmund Calamy.
titleStmt.author: Calamy, Edmund, 1671-1732.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
